Create test modules;
	Empty dll
	Empty dll with Dllmain
	Empty dll with Dllmain + CRT linked
	MessageBox func with Dllmain + CRT linked

Handle methods;
	OpenProcess
	CreateProcess child process
	DuplicateHandle
	Handle stealer methods...
